EmailTemplate.subject: TrueCost - Invoice and Support
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please see attached for this month's TrueCost invoice and support.
Feel free to contact me directly with any questions or comments.
The TrueCost team appreciates your business.
Thanks for your time,
Bobby Dornbos TrueCost REP Support 713-207-2076 robert.dornbos@centerpointenergy.com
